SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwBMSprigganScript
;spriggan must be killed 3 times before they die permanently
;effect is played when she revives
;sprigganeffect script shuts off the effect


short deathvar
float time
short playonce
short alive

Begin OnActivate

	If (deathvar==3)   ;after killed 3 times, she acts like dead creature
		Activate
	else
		return
	endif
end

Begin OnDeath
	set alive to 0
	set deathvar to  deathvar + 1
end

Begin GameMode
	If deathvar == 3
		return
	endif

	if (deathvar==1)
		if playonce == 0
			set time to ( time + GetSecondsPassed )	
			If (time>=1)
				PlayMagicEffectVisuals PARA 1
				PlaySound3D 0sprigganSresurrect
				Resurrect 1	; revives spriggan
				SetScale 1.10  ;increase her size
				StartCombat Player
				ModAV Health 2
				ModAV ResistParalysis 100
				ModAV ResistPoison 100
				Set playonce to 1
				Set time to 0
			endif
		endif


	elseif (deathvar==2)
		if playonce == 1
			set time to ( time + GetSecondsPassed )	
			if (time>=1)
				PlayMagicEffectVisuals PARA 1
				PlaySound3D 0sprigganSresurrect
				Resurrect 1	; revives spriggan when activated by player
				SetScale 1.20  ;increase her size
				StartCombat Player
				ModAV Health 3
				ModAV ResistParalysis 100
				ModAV ResistPoison 100
				ModAV ResistMagic 80
				ModAV ResistFire 100
				ModAV ResistFrost 100
				set playonce to 2
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1093 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
